samples.question: Do you work or are you a student?
samples.transcript: I am a senior in high school. So, I am graduating this year.
samples.transcript_original: I'm a senior in high school. So, I'm graduating this year.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I am a senior in high school. So, I am graduating this year.

samples.question: What subjects are you studying?
samples.transcript: Well, since I study in a public high school, I do not really have a choice the subjects that I get to study. So, I have to study some compulsory subjects like calculus, history, literature, and there are some extracurricular activities like drama classes and swimming that I can take. However, since I am preparing for my exams and for my college admission, I do not really have time to take up those extracurricular activities.
samples.transcript_original: Well, since I study in a public high school, I don't really have a choice the subjects that I get to study. So, I have to study some compulsory subjects like calculus, history, literature, and there are some extracurricular activities like drama classes and swimming that I can take. However, since I am preparing for my exams and for my college admission, um I don't really have time to take up those extracurricular activities.

However, since I am preparing for my exams and for my college admission, I do not really have time to take up those extracurricular activities.

samples.question: And what would you like to do in the future?
samples.transcript: That is a really interesting question. I am really into political science. So, probably that is the sphere where I will pursue my bachelor's and hopefully master's degree and maybe my career as well.
samples.transcript_original: That's a really interesting question. I'm really into political science. So, probably that's the sphere uh where I'll pursue my bachelor's and hopefully master's degree and maybe my career as well.
samples.transcript_cleaned: That is a really interesting question. I am really into political science. So, probably that is the sphere where I will pursue my bachelor's and hopefully master's degree and maybe my career as well.

samples.question: Do you have a favorite cafe?
samples.transcript: Sure. It is a place right near my house. it is a warm, cozy place.
samples.transcript_original: Uh, sure. It is a place right near my house. It's a warm, cozy place.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Sure. It is a place right near my house. it is a warm, cozy place.

samples.question: What makes it special is the friendly atmosphere there.
samples.transcript: Also I love the attention and love with which the staff make each cup of coffee. It makes the experience even more enjoyable.
samples.transcript_original: Um, also I love the attention and love with which the staff make each cup of coffee. It makes the experience even more enjoyable.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Also I love the attention and love with which the staff make each cup of coffee. It makes the experience even more enjoyable.

samples.question: Do you often go to cafes by yourself?
samples.transcript: Yes, I find cafes to be a perfect place to work and or unwind with a book because the hum of background conversations coupled with some soft music, they give you the feeling of concentration without the feeling of isolation.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I find uh cafes to be a perfect place to work and or unwind with a book because the hum of background conversations coupled with some soft music, they give you the feeling of concentration without the feeling of isolation.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I find cafes to be a perfect place to work and or unwind with a book because the hum of background conversations coupled with some soft music, they give you the feeling of concentration without the feeling of isolation.

samples.question: What do you think helps to make a cafe popular?
samples.transcript: Well, there are several factors that make a certain cafe popular among people. The first that immediately springs to my mind is a word of mouth recommendations. I mean, if a cafe has good food there, good service and etc. People would be more likely to visit it again probably with their friends. So, it would help to grow it a loyal clientele. also we have to consider that since we live in a digital era era it is important to pay attention to media presence. So if cafes make their Instagram, Tik Tok or even maybe YouTube pages more attractive to visitors, it can play a significant role in their popularity.
samples.transcript_original: Well, uh, there are several factors that make a certain cafe popular among people. The first that immediately springs to my mind is a word of mouth recommendations. I mean, if a cafe has good food there, good service um, and etc. People would be more likely to visit it again probably with their friends. So, it would help to grow it a loyal clientele. Um also we have to consider that since we live in a digital era uh era it is important to pay attention to media presence. So if cafes make their uh Instagram, Tik Tok or even maybe YouTube pages more attractive to visitors, it can play a significant role in their popularity.

I mean, if a cafe has good food there, good service and etc. People would be more likely to visit it again probably with their friends. So, it would help to grow it a loyal clientele. also we have to consider that since we live in a digital era era it is important to pay attention to media presence. So if cafes make their Instagram, Tik Tok or even maybe YouTube pages more attractive to visitors, it can play a significant role in their popularity.

samples.question: Why do some people prefer cafes that are part of larger chains rather than small local independent cafes?
samples.transcript: Wow, that is a really interesting question. probably because international cafe chains, they are they seem more reliable to people because they already know what to expect and usually they offer certain conveniences like huge parking spaces or reliable Wi-Fi to their customers.
samples.transcript_original: Wow, that's a really interesting question. probably because international cafe chains, they are um they seem more reliable to people because they already know what to expect and usually they offer certain conveniences like huge parking spaces or reliable Wi-Fi to their uh customers.

samples.question: Do you like to use perfume?
samples.transcript: I love perfume. it is honestly a part of my outfit. If I do not have perfume on, I feel as if there is a part of my outfit that is missing. So, honestly, I have a very big collection of perfumes that I use. And in fact, all of my family members are obsessed with like smell and with perfume. So, I think it is something that runs in my runs in my blood.
samples.transcript_original: I love perfume. It's honestly a part of my outfit. If I do not have perfume on, I feel as if there's a part of my outfit that's missing. So, honestly, I have a very big collection of perfumes that I use. And in fact, all of my family members are obsessed with um like smell and with perfume. So, I think it's something that runs in my runs in my blood.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I love perfume. it is honestly a part of my outfit. If I do not have perfume on, I feel as if there is a part of my outfit that is missing. So, honestly, I have a very big collection of perfumes that I use. And in fact, all of my family members are obsessed with like smell and with perfume. So, I think it is something that runs in my runs in my blood.

samples.question: And how often do you wear perfume?
samples.transcript: Every single day. I wear different perfume. every single day. By the way, that depends on my mood and what outfit I am wearing for the day.
samples.transcript_original: Every single day. I wear different perfume. every single day. By the way, um that depends on my mood and what outfit I'm wearing for the day.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Every single day. I wear different perfume. every single day. By the way, that depends on my mood and what outfit I am wearing for the day.

samples.question: Have you ever given perfume as a gift?
samples.transcript: Well, I did not really think that it is a good sign to give perfume, at least in our culture in Kazakhstan. but to my international friends that came visiting from Italy, there was a certain perfume that I bought from the UAE and it had a very specific smell that I knew that my Italian friends would enjoy. So I that was the only occasion when I gave perfume as a present. although I have been to many different places with beautiful scenery, there is a place that has a special place in my heart and it is the Swiss Alps. I think the Swiss Alps are famous worldwide for how beautiful the mountains are, especially in the winter. and I had the opportunity to visit the Swiss Alps last December with my family as we were staying there for a family holiday. It was a very interesting destination and a very interesting choice that I have made because I got to choose where our family was heading. And the country that immediately sprung to my mind was Switzerland because I know that Switzerland is known for its gorgeous nature. And since we visited Switzerland in December, we decided to go to the Alps and stay in a very small village that is not densely populated. And that gave us a chance to enjoy the beauty of the mountains fully because we were able to see huskys running all over the place. And we were able to go snowboarding and hiking which was very enjoyable because of the fresh air and the freshness that the Swiss Alps offer. Since we have been there in December, we got to the airport right after fresh snowfall and that made the experience even more surreal. We also got to visit a few virgin forests. The experience is indescribable because the nature there is was unexpectedly beautiful. I have never thought that I would be lost for words when I saw this scenery. It was a totally picture skew scenery. Also, our hotel room had a beautiful view of a lake that had a glass-like coverage on it, and it felt as if we can go ice skating there, but unfortunately.

samples.question: Would you like to return to the Swiss Alps?
samples.transcript: Sure. If I ever get an opportunity again, I would love to go there. So.
samples.transcript_original: Um, sure. If I ever get an opportunity again, I'd love to go there. So,.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Sure. If I ever get an opportunity again, I would love to go there.

samples.question: What do you think?
samples.transcript: Well, on the one hand, some products really are overhyped and they do not they are not worth the hype that they are getting from the audience. But on the other hand, there are some products that serve a genuine purpose. for example, they can improve your skin, make your skin brighter, and reduce your acne, for example. So yeah, while some products are overly estimated and they are not worth the attention that they are getting, there are many other products that are in fact helpful and useful not only in terms of improving your skin improving your skin and the way that you look like your natural appearances, but also in boosting your self-confidence.

samples.question: How do you think the beauty industry advertised their products so successfully?
samples.transcript: Well, I believe that the way that the marketing sphere is built and the way that they market their products is very interesting because the beauty industry itself downplays on the humans's most important need and that is the need to be accepted by society. So they make up their own insecurities. They bring up the insecurities in women and they make their products sort of the answer towards the insecurity. And it is really interesting how they do it because once women feel insecure about something, they search for a project that solves the problem and it turns out that the solution is their product. Yes, that is very true.
